definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: The initial acceleration is due to the strong shock-related magnetic field compression.
sentences.chinese: 开始的加速是由于强激波相关的磁场压缩导致的。

sentences.english: The working principle and system composition of shock wave soot blower were recommended briefly.
sentences.chinese: 简要介绍了激波吹灰器的工作原理和系统组成。

sentences.english: The pre-pressure water shock tube dynamic calibration method is put forward.
sentences.chinese: 提出了预压水激波管动态校准方法。

sentences.english: Laser heating and melting and laser-produced transient shock waves together lead to the densification of the microstructure in the surface and sub-surface.
sentences.chinese: 激光引起的加热熔化和激波效应同时使表层组织致密。

sentences.english: The shock interaction with the particles is visualized using the schlieren photography.
sentences.chinese: 用纹影仪拍摄了激波与颗粒群相互干涉的照片。

sentences.english: Recently the shock tube has been used to drive gasdynamic laser.
sentences.chinese: 最近，激波管已被用来驱动气动激光器。

sentences.english: A general form of the dispersion-controlled dissipative(DCD)scheme is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 频散可控格式是高精度捕捉激波的新格式。

sentences.english: Anaerobic bio-reactor with shock wave can produce the methane in ambient temperature.
sentences.chinese: 激波厌氧反应器可在常温下成功实现产甲烷过程。

sentences.english: This thesis is about Finite Point Method (FPM) and numerical shock instability.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究了有限点方法和数值激波不稳定现象。

sentences.english: Analyses of shock structure based on the kinetic theory of gases have been completed.
sentences.chinese: 根据气体动力学理论分析激波结构的工作已经完成了。

sentences.english: The vortices of the plume and the height of the jet interaction shock increase with increasing incidence angle and jet pressure.
sentences.chinese: 高射流压力和射流角增加羽流涡度，激波位置较高。

sentences.english: This paper presents an experimental technique of diaphragm bursting by virtue of the rarefaction wave in double driver shock tube.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了在双驱动激波管中运用稀疏波破膜的技术。

sentences.english: Meanwhile the forward fast compression waves become a fast shock through nonlinear steepening process.
sentences.chinese: 所发出的前向快压缩波经非线性变陡形成快激波。

sentences.english: Finally, an engineering approach for nearly shock-free wing design is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 最后介绍了近无激波机翼修型的工程设计方法。

sentences.english: And optimization computation for reducing drag of Shockwave of single airfoil in transonic flow is also successful.
sentences.chinese: 同时进行了单段翼型跨音速降低激波阻力的优化设计。

definition: wake (trailing behind a ship, airplane etc)/slipstream
